subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ comeback victory against the Washington Redskins in Week 3 was just the first of several games, most of them away from home, that sprung up as tests to the team’s resolve.
snippet: The Giants’ comeback victory against the Washington Redskins in Week 3 was just the first of several games, most of them away from home, that sprung up as tests to the team’s resolve.
